overview_of_class: This course covers principles of copyright, contracts, and entertainment business practices from the perspective of the producer/artist/creator. The class reads and discusses actual cases and contract language to learn the legal structure of the entertainment industry. Discussions cover social and artistic concerns raised by legislative actions and judicial interpretations.
name: Law of the Creative Process
title: SoC COMM_ST 302-0-20 Law of the Creative Process
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Juniors & Seniors

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course covers principles of copyright, contracts, and entertainment business practices from the perspective of the producer/artist/creator. The class reads and discusses actual cases and contract language to learn the legal structure of the entertainment industry. Discussions cover social and artistic concerns raised by legislative actions and judicial interpretations.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Biederman, Donald E., et. al., Law and Business of the Entertainment Industries, 5th Ed., Westport: Praeger (2006).

subject: COMM_ST
